entry.name: Sound Bank ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: soundBankId
Description: Sound bank ID -1: no bank, other: bank with specified ID

entry.name: Sound Break SE ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: soundBreakSEId
Description: Destruction sound SEID (9 digits) -1: Generated from assetId

entry.name: Draw Param Reference ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: refDrawParamId
Description: Drawing parameter reference ID. The reference ID for the part drawing parameter .xlsm.

entry.name: Hit Create Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hitCreateType
Description: Sets the hit build type for static assets. Ignored for dynamic assets.

entry.name: Behavior Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: behaviorType
Description: Dynamic (all asset features available), static (light assets with limited functionality treated as old maps), partially static (partially destroyed assets)

entry.name: Collision Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: collisionType
Description: Collision detection type. You can set what the asset will hit

entry.name: Rain Blocking Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: rainBlockingType
Description: It is a type of rain blocking. You can set the blocking of SFX and wet expression.

entry.name: HP
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hp
Description: Durability until destruction (-1: Indestructible)

entry.name: Defence
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: defense
Description: Attack power below this value is no damage

entry.name: Destruction Stop Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakStopTime
Description: Time from destruction to forced stop of rigid body (do not force stop at 0)

entry.name: Destruction SFX ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakSfxId
Description: SFX ID at the time of destruction (-1: Default (810030))

entry.name: Destruction SFX Dummy Poly ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakSfxCpId
Description: SFX generation position at the time of destruction Damipoly ID (-1: placement position)

entry.name: Destruction Landing SFX ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakLandingSfxId
Description: Object material-dependent SFX identifier that regenerates when first landing after being destroyed (-1: does not occur)

entry.name: Destruction Bullet Behavior ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakBulletBehaviorId
Description: Action parameter of [bullet] at the time of destruction (-1: does not occur). Please note that there is an offset specification due to laps.

entry.name: Destruction Bullet Dummy Poly ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakBulletCpId
Description: Location of [bullet] at the time of destruction Damipoli ID (-1: placement position)

entry.name: Debris - Wait Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: FragmentInvisibleWaitTime
Description: Hidden debris Waiting time (seconds)

entry.name: Debris - Time to Hide
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: FragmentInvisibleTime
Description: Time to hide debris (seconds)

entry.name: Destruction AI Sound ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: BreakAiSoundID
Description: AI sound ID generated at the time of destruction

entry.name: Destruction Item Lot Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakItemLotType
Description: A type that decides how to obtain items drawn at the time of destruction

entry.name: Anim Break ID Max
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: animBreakIdMax
Description: What is the animation destruction ID from 0 to what?

entry.name: Destruction Bullet Attribute Damage Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakBulletAttributeDamageType
Description: Generates a bullet if the last damage received when destroying an asset meets the conditions of this setting.

entry.name: Is Destroyed on Player Collision
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isBreakByPlayerCollide
Description: Broken when the player touches (0: no, 1: yes)

entry.name: Is Destroyed on Enemy Collision
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isBreakByEnemyCollide
Description: Broken when an enemy character touches (0: No, 1: yes)

entry.name: Is Destroyed by Riding
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isBreak_ByChrRide
Description: Will it break if the character gets on (0: it won't break 1: it will break)

entry.name: Is Destroyed by Default
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isDisableBreakForFirstAppear
Description: Broken at the initial appearance of the player (0: yes, 1: no)

entry.name: Is Animated Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isAnimBreak
Description: Is it animation destruction (0: physical destruction, 1: animation destruction)

entry.name: Is Damage Transferred
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isDamageCover
Description: Whether to pass the damage to the other side when receiving damage (0: pass, 1: do not pass)

entry.name: Is Attack Backlash
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isAttackBacklash
Description: Do you play the attack (0: do not play, 1: play)

entry.name: Is Ladder
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isLadder
Description: Is it a ladder (0: different, 1: yes)

entry.name: Is Moving Object
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isMoveObj
Description: Is it a moving object? It is a flag used for branching of movement processing at the time of multi (0: different, 1: yes)

entry.name: Is Skydome
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isSkydomeFlag
Description: Processing that treats the celestial sphere (player tracking, etc.) is performed (0: different, 1: yes)

entry.name: Is Paused during Cutscene
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isAnimPauseOnRemoPlay
Description: Do you want to stop the animation during the poly play (0: not, 1: do)

entry.name: Is Flammable
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isBurn
Description: Will it burn (0: no, 1: yes)

entry.name: Is Repicked
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isEnableRepick
Description: If this flag is ○, the parameter "At the time of recollection _ ***" will be used for the assets to be collected again in units of placement.

entry.name: Is Destroyed on Pickup
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isBreakOnPickUp
Description: If ×, play the animation at the time of collection, if ○, destroy at the time of collection (destroy in all cases including replacement)

entry.name: Is Destroyed by Giant Collision
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isBreakByHugeenemyCollide
Description: Broken when a giant enemy touches (0: No, 1:)

entry.name: Navmesh Flag
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: navimeshFlag
Description: Navigation mesh flag set from assets before destruction

entry.name: Burn Bullet Interval
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnBulletInterval
Description: Interval (frame) to generate bullets for spreading fire

entry.name: Camera Distance to Update Cloth
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: clothUpdateDist
Description: Distance from the camera to update havokCloth (0: always update)

entry.name: Duration after Creation until Disappearance
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: lifeTime_forRuntimeCreate
Description: Runtime-generated time after creation until disappearance (0: does not disappear)

entry.name: Contact SE ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: contactSeId
Description: SE ID to play when touched by a local player operated by you (-1: Do not play)

entry.name: Repick Anim ID Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: repickAnimIdOffset
Description: When recollecting assets with "Is there a change at the time of recollection?" In units of placement, play the uncollected / collected animation with the anime ID offset by this value.

entry.name: Wind Effect Rate - Before Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: windEffectRate_0
Description: Wind coefficient (before destruction)

entry.name: Wind Effect Rate - After Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: windEffectRate_1
Description: Wind coefficient (after destruction)

entry.name: Wind Effect Type - Before Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: windEffectType_0
Description: Wind effect type (before destruction)

entry.name: Wind Effect Type - After Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: windEffectType_1
Description: Wind effect type (after destruction)

entry.name: Override Material ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: overrideMaterialId
Description: Asset material ID overwrite setting (-1: Do not overwrite model material ID 0 or more: Material ID overwrite) On the ladder, the material ID is reflected only with this setting

entry.name: Automatic Generation Height Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: autoCreateOffsetHeight
Description: Height offset of how much it floats from where the raycast hits the map when it is automatically generated [m]

entry.name: Burn Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnTime
Description: Burning time (seconds) (continues to burn at 0)

entry.name: Burn Destroy Rate
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnBraekRate
Description: Burnup threshold for switching to the ruptured state

entry.name: Burn SFX ID [0]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxId
Description: SFX ID at the time of combustion: 0 (-1: No SFX)

entry.name: Burn SFX ID [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxId_1
Description: SFX ID at the time of combustion: 1 (-1: No SFX)

entry.name: Burn SFX ID [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxId_2
Description: SFX ID at the time of combustion: 2 (-1: No SFX)

entry.name: Burn SFX ID [3]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxId_3
Description: SFX ID at the time of combustion: 3 (-1: No SFX)

entry.name: Burn SFX Minimum Delay Time [0]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxDelayTimeMin
Description: SFX generation delay time during combustion randomly determined between start and end times

entry.name: Burn SFX Minimum Delay Time [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxDelayTimeMin_1
Description: SFX generation delay time during combustion randomly determined between start and end times

entry.name: Burn SFX Minimum Delay Time [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxDelayTimeMin_2
Description: SFX generation delay time during combustion randomly determined between start and end times

entry.name: Burn SFX Minimum Delay Time [3]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxDelayTimeMin_3
Description: SFX generation delay time during combustion randomly determined between start and end times

entry.name: Burn SFX Maximum Delay Time [0]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxDelayTimeMax
Description: SFX generation delay time during combustion randomly determined between start and end times

entry.name: Burn SFX Maximum Delay Time [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxDelayTimeMax_1
Description: SFX generation delay time during combustion randomly determined between start and end times

entry.name: Burn SFX Maximum Delay Time [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxDelayTimeMax_2
Description: SFX generation delay time during combustion randomly determined between start and end times

entry.name: Burn SFX Maximum Delay Time [3]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnSfxDelayTimeMax_3
Description: SFX generation delay time during combustion randomly determined between start and end times

entry.name: Burn Bullet Behavior ID [0]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnBulletBehaviorId
Description: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning: 0 (-1: does not occur)

entry.name: Burn Bullet Behavior ID [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnBulletBehaviorId_1
Description: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning: 1 (-1: does not occur)

entry.name: Burn Bullet Behavior ID [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnBulletBehaviorId_2
Description: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning: 2 (-1: does not occur)

entry.name: Burn Bullet Behavior ID [3]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnBulletBehaviorId_3
Description: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning: 3 (-1: does not occur)

entry.name: Burn Bullet Delay Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: burnBulletDelayTime
Description: Time to delay the generation of bullets for fire spread (seconds)

entry.name: Paint Decal Target Texture Size
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: paintDecalTargetTextureSize
Description: Paint decal target size 0: Decal disabled (0 to 4096 power of 2 0, 2, 4, 8,… 2048 only valid)

entry.name: Navmesh Flag - Destroyed Asset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: navimeshFlag_after
Description: Navimesh flag set from the destroyed asset

entry.name: Near Camera Behavior Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: camNearBehaviorType
Description: Drawing settings when approaching the camera.

entry.name: Destroyed Item Lot Param ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: breakItemLotParamId
Description: Item to be drawn at the time of destruction Lottery ID_for map-1: No lottery

entry.name: Pickup Action Button Param ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: pickUpActionButtonParamId
Description: Action button ID issued for collection-1: Collection function is disabled

entry.name: Pickup Item Lot Param ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: pickUpItemLotParamId
Description: Item to be drawn at the time of collection For lottery ID_map-1: Collection function is invalid

entry.name: Auto Draw Group: Backface Check
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: autoDrawGroupBackFaceCheck
Description: Automatic drawing group_Back side check

entry.name: Auto Draw Group: Depth Write
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: autoDrawGroupDepthWrite
Description: Auto drawing group_shield

entry.name: Auto Draw Group: Shadow Test
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: autoDrawGroupShadowTest
Description: Automatic drawing group_shadow test

entry.name: Is Height Check Enabled
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: debug_isHeightCheckEnable
Description: Debug_Allow Ground Height Check

entry.name: Exclude from Subfloor Navmesh if below Hit
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hitCarverCancelAreaFlag
Description: If it is placed lower than the hit on the floor (ground), set whether to exclude it from the underfloor navigation mesh deletion target Refer to from the tool

entry.name: Block Navmesh Combine
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: assetNavimeshNoCombine
Description: The set assets are excluded from the target of joining hit parts when building the Nav Mesh.

entry.name: Navmesh Flag Apply Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: navimeshFlagApply
Description: Where to apply the Nav Mesh flag set from the asset

entry.name: Navmesh Flag Apply Type - Destroyed
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: navimeshFlagApply_after
Description: Where to apply the navigation mesh flag set from the destroyed asset

entry.name: Auto Draw Group: Pass Pixel Number
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: autoDrawGroupPassPixelNum
Description: Automatic drawing group_Pass pixel (set to 0.0-1.0 to enlarge at the time of shooting)

entry.name: Pickup Replacement - Event Flag
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: pickUpReplacementEventFlag
Description: When this event flag is ON, use the ID of the subsequent replacement 0: Do not always replace

entry.name: Pickup Replacement - Anim ID Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: pickUpReplacementAnimIdOffset
Description: When "Collecting_replacement flag condition" is ON, play the uncollected / collected animation with the animation ID offset by this value.

entry.name: Pickup Replacement - Action Button Param ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: pickUpReplacementActionButtonParamId
Description: This action button ID is used when "Collecting_replacement flag condition" is ON.

entry.name: Pickup Replacement - Item Lot Param ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: pickUpReplacementItemLotParamId
Description: When "Collecting_replacement flag condition" is ON, this item lottery ID_map is used.

entry.name: Sliding Bullet Hit Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: slidingBulletHitType
Description: When a bullet of the follow-up type "Crawling on the ground even if it collides" collides with an asset, does it bend in the direction along the landing point? Behavior

entry.name: Is Damaged by Special Attacks
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isBushesForDamage
Description: ◯ Assets can only be damaged by "damage to bushes" ◯ and "object attack power> defense power" attacks

entry.name: Penetration Bullet Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: penetrationBulletType
Description: Will the bullet hit and land? Which bullet para to refer to when deciding? The value that determines.

entry.name: Destruction - Sound SE Dummy Poly ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: soundBreakSECpId
Description: Damipoli ID of the place where the destruction sound is played (-1: Placement position)

entry.name: Debug - Height Check Minimum
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: debug_HeightCheckCapacityMin
Description: Debug_Allowable ground height_Minimum [m] Must be smaller than maximum

entry.name: Debug - Height Check Maximum
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: debug_HeightCheckCapacityMax
Description: Debug_Allowable ground height_Max [m] Must be larger than minimum

entry.name: Repick - Action Button ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: repickActionButtonParamId
Description: This action button ID is used when recollecting assets whose "Is there a change at the time of recollection?"

entry.name: Repick - Item Lot Param ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: repickItemLotParamId
Description: Assets with "Is there a change at the time of recollection?" Are used for this item lottery ID_map when recollecting in units of placement.

entry.name: Repick Replacement - Anim ID Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: repickReplacementAnimIdOffset
Description: Use this parameter instead of "At the time of collection_replacement animation offset" at the time of recollection for assets whose "Is there a change at the time of recollection?"

entry.name: Repick Replacement - Action Button Param ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: repickReplacementActionButtonParamId
Description: Use this parameter instead of "At the time of collection_replacement action button ID" when recollecting assets whose "Is there a change at the time of recollection?"

entry.name: Repick Replacement - Item Lot ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: repickReplacementItemLotParamId
Description: Use this parameter instead of "At the time of collection_Replacement item lottery ID_For map" when recollecting assets whose "Is there a change at the time of recollection?"

entry.name: Is Hit Carver Generation Blocked
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: noGenerateCarver
Description: Asset with this set does not create Carver

entry.name: Is Giant Enemy Hit by Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: noHitHugeAfterBreak
Description: Overwrite the hit filter after destruction with a collision detection type that does not hit a huge enemy (static ○ dynamic ○)

entry.name: Is Destruction Synchronized
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isEnabledBreakSync
Description: If this is x, do not perform initial synchronization, map activation synchronization, asset destruction synchronization during in-game, and the attack of the remote PC will not hit.

entry.name: Is Hidden on Repick
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isHiddenOnRepick
Description: Hide assets if you can't get them by lottery when recollecting by placement unit

entry.name: Is Valid for Multiplayer Only
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isCreateMultiPlayOnly
Description: Is it valid only during multi? Only valid for dynamic assets.

entry.name: Is Bullet Hit SFX Disabled
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isDisableBulletHitSfx
Description: In the case of ○, the landing SFX does not occur regardless of whether the hit bullet penetrates or lands.

entry.name: Is Bloodstain/Sign Enabled before Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isEnableSignPreBreak
Description: Set whether sign / blood character can be created when on the asset (before destruction) 〇: Possible, ×: Impossible

entry.name: Is Bloodstain/Sign Enabled after Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isEnableSignPostBreak
Description: Set whether sign / blood character can be created when on the asset (after destruction) 〇: Possible, ×: Impossible

entry.name: Multiplayer Forbidden Region Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: generateMultiForbiddenRegion
Description: Summoning prohibited / intrusion prohibited area generation (Damipoli)

entry.name: Resident SE ID [0]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: residentSeId0
Description: Sound ID 0 (9 digits) to be resident in the asset (-1: No resident)

entry.name: Resident SE ID [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: residentSeId1
Description: Sound ID 1 (9 digits) to be resident in the asset (-1: not resident)

entry.name: Resident SE ID [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: residentSeId2
Description: Sound ID 2 (9 digits) to be resident in the asset (-1: not resident)

entry.name: Resident SE ID [3]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: residentSeId3
Description: Sound ID 3 (9 digits) to be resident in the asset (-1: not resident)

entry.name: Resident SE ID - Dummy Poly [0]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: residentSeDmypolyId0
Description: Damipoli ID0 to attach resident sound (-1: placement position)

entry.name: Resident SE ID - Dummy Poly [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: residentSeDmypolyId1
Description: Damipoli ID1 to attach resident sound (-1: placement position)

entry.name: Resident SE ID - Dummy Poly [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: residentSeDmypolyId2
Description: Damipoli ID2 to attach resident sound (-1: placement position)

entry.name: Resident SE ID - Dummy Poly [3]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: residentSeDmypolyId3
Description: Damipoli ID3 to attach resident sound (-1: placement position)

entry.name: Exclude Activate Ratio - Xbox One Grid
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: excludeActivateRatio_Xboxone_Grid
Description: Open_XB1 exclusion rate

entry.name: Exclude Activate Ratio - Xbox One Legacy
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: excludeActivateRatio_Xboxone_Legacy
Description: Legacy_XB1 exclusion rate

entry.name: Exclude Activate Ratio - PS4 Grid
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: excludeActivateRatio_PS4_Grid
Description: Open_PS4 exclusion rate

entry.name: Exclude Activate Ratio - PS4 Legacy
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: excludeActivateRatio_PS4_Legacy
Description: Legacy_PS4 exclusion rate
